main event: A passenger on a TWA Constellation flight observed a round red object while flying over Utah.
interesting points: The object was seen illuminated from the inside, not like a reflection.,The sighting lasted approximately 3-4 seconds.,The passenger noted that the object disappeared from view quickly.,There were no city lights or moonlight to distract from the observation.,The passenger had been gazing out the window, seemingly in a sleepy state, prior to the sighting.
witness description: a passenger on a TWA Constellation flight
